title: Disconnection/Not Responding
body: This has been happening for about a week now. Every time I'm in the loading screen and I'm at 100% I get the message "You have been disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again." So I close the message and reconnect. I wait for it to get to 100% and this time I spawn at fountain only to have the game not respond (it doesn't stop working it just has that white over the game). I have to wait around two minutes for the game to respond and when it does I have to wait even more because it's "Attempting to Reconnect". After all this waiting I am finally able to play the game and lane against someone with a level advantage (really fun losing lane due to something that isn't my fault). Please fix.

replies.body:
This issue definitely sounds like it's caused by an issue in your connection or network configuration somewhere. As your first step, I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if those steps helped.

I did everything there is on that guide and it's still happening. I doubt it's on my side.

Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) since the connection guide as Targon suggested didn't work.  Our tech team can take a closer look and help individually with your case.  It would help to grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach some logs to the ticket for more context.  We'll get back to you!
